name: FlipPix Art - Dollhouse
description:
A Dollhouse for everyone? Yes, that’s right! Even boys, large and small, will find something they like about playing this dollhouse logic puzzle game. Remember that all FlipPix puzzles include levels that can be played by ages 5-90! FlipPix - Dollhouse contains 244 puzzles in a variety of sizes from 5x5 to 20x20.

An old Japanese logic puzzle takes on a new look with FlipPix Art! Touch tiles to paint them or break them to form colorful components of paintings. The goal is to use logic to determine which tiles should be filled to reveal a hidden picture.

Also known as nonograms or griddlers, FlipPix Art puzzles are designed specifically for Tablet devices.

A short tutorial on the basics of the game is included.
